item.title: Hugo - **highlight** :art:
item.description:
Hugo comes with reallly fast syntax highlighting from Chroma. From Hugo 0.28, the default syntax hightlighter in Hugo is Chroma; it is built in Go and is really, really fast â€“ and for the most important parts compatible with Pygments. See https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting for more.

In this theme we set

config.toml 

pygmentsUseClasses = true
demo

and provide static/css/syntax.css which is a copy of: static/css/syntax/syntax.<STYLE>.css

The styles are: autumn borland bw colorful default emacs friendly fruity manni monokai murphy native pastie perldoc rrt tango trac vim vs
